section.title: System Requirements
Installation Instructions
section.note: These instructions were written for XAMPP 1.7.7 with PHP 5.3.8 and for phpMyAdmin 3.4.5. Later versions of these packages may change the location or name of some options, however the following installation steps should remain valid and basically the same.
section.p: In case you have a web server configured with PHP, MySQL, you can deploy the WebHelp output directly. Otherwise, install XAMPP. XAMPP is a free and open source cross-platform web server solution stack package. It consists mainly of the Apache HTTP Server, MySQL database, and interpreters for scripts written in the PHP.

Create a database for the feedback system and a MySQL user with privileges on that database. The feedback system uses the MySQL user to connect to the database. The username and password for the database administrator are pre-required. For XAMPP, the defaults are root for the username and the password is empty.
